name: Alpha - Defuser Maduro - Half CoronaÂ
additionalNotes: After becoming a hit with their absinthe infused cigars, Alpha Cigars decided to surprise everybody by creating a non-infused cigar line. Thus, the Alpha Defuser cigar was born. The Alpha Defuser Maduro features a dark, sweet San Andres Maduro wrapper that surrounds an Olor Dominicano binder and a filler made of Cuban-seed Piloto Cubano leaves to create a mild to medium-bodied cigar. The Alpha Defuser Maduro has an earthy and spicy flavor profile with hints of sweetness.
